title: No gemstone with world's master pass
body: I purchased the world's master pass and haven not received my gemstone around a week and a half later?

replies.body: The gemstone doesn't come with a toast or notification, just added to your loot.  I do see you received a gem stone on the 22nd upon purchasing a Worlds Master Pass.  Your total should currently be at 7.  Let me know if that clears things up!
